name: Roundpingis
description:
Are you up for a challenge? Get ready for this ping pong game that is simple to play, but very hard to master. Just smash around like a star and keep the ball on the table!

- Instant play.
- For all ages.
- Ad-free and no in-app purchases.
- Challenge your Round Pingis buddies and try to top the global charts.
- Whole lot of fun!

Pastille, is a Swedish game studio. We create fun, casual and non-violent games for the whole family and believe that playing is one of the most important cornerstones in life.

We deeply care about sustainability, ethics, social- and gender equality, human- and animal rights.

Our goal is to contribute to a better world by creating tasty, colourful games and to donate profit to charity.

10% of all sales goes to charity. After we covered the development cost, 20% of profit goes to charity.

Round Pingis supports the Against Malaria Foundation (AMF). Bed nets are the most effective way to prevent malaria in children, who account for the majority of malaria-related deaths. https://www.againstmalaria.com
